A sermon of the nature and end of repentance shadowed in the ministerie of Iohn the Baptist. Preached the Sunday afore Lent. 1613. Case, William, 1584 or 5-1634.
[4], 30 p.
Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Edmund Weauer, and are to sould at the great south-dore of Pauls, London : 1616.
Dedication signed: William Case. Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
